mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (id, password, nickname, email, animalType) VALUES (#{id}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{email}, animalType)
INSERT INTO wish (wish_no, user_id, place_no) VALUES (NULL, #{userId}, #{placeNo})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM wish WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND place_no = #{placeNo}
mapper.select: SELECT place.place_no AS no, title, content, category, written_date AS writtenDate, gu_address AS guAddress, detail_address AS detailAddress, x, y, place.user_id AS userId FROM wish INNER JOIN place ON wish.place_no = place.place_no WHERE wish.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT place.place_no AS no, title, gu_address, after_gu_address, detail_address, x, y, star, category FROM place LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT AVG(star) AS star, place_no FROM reply GROUP BY place_no ) AS r ON place.place_no = r.place_no WHERE place.user_id = #{id}

SELECT reply.reply_no AS no, reply.user_id AS userId, place_no AS placeNo, reply.content AS content, star, reply.written_date AS writtenDate, place.title AS placeTitle FROM reply INNER JOIN place ON reply.place_no = place.place_no WHERE reply.user_id = #{id}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM user WHERE id = #{id} AND password = #{password}
mapper.select: SELECT pet_type FROM user WHERE id = #{id}
